ComicInfo.Title: Vince Cleans Up; Carl Remembers; The Lord Of Eltingville and His Pal Frank Sinatra; Dirty Laundry Comics (More Good Clean Fun with the Crumb Family); Fishlip Gets a Haircut; Fatal Fellatio; Bare Despair; A Day in the Life of Jeff, Jeff and Mike; The Mystic Shrine; The Fuck; Minima de Malis

ComicInfo.Summary:
Vince, his job at a strip club and the details of his death.
Carl recalls happier days with Nan.
Doodles' funeral.
The Lord and Frank, two fabulous friends, hang out.
Aline admires her newly slim body and criticizes Robert's flabby stomach. Robert ponders how explicit this comic should be. The couple goes out in the yard to cut the weeds.
The consequences of a bad haircut
Casual sex ends in tragedy
Burma is unfaithful
An irate parent interrupts the guys hanging out
Kewpie learns the secret of the mystic shrine
The world's strangest fuck and how it came about.
A spate of cattle mutilation.
